name.name: name
name.reqs: Name can contain letters, numbers, special letters and spaces.

password.name: password
password.reqs: Password needs to be at least 8 letters long, and must contain- a small letter, a capital letter, a number and a special symbol.

email.name: email
email.reqs: Must be a valid email address

validate_password.name: validate_password
validate_password.reqs: Must be identical to the password
